thread.title: Social media: I dont have Facebook account Andre Ayew
thread.title_full: Social media: I dont have Facebook account Andre Ayew

title: Social media: I dont have Facebook account Andre Ayew
text:
Sports News | 9 October 2015 19:40 CET Social media: ‘I don’t have Facebook account’ – Andre Ayew - www.allsports.com.gh 
Swansea star Andre Ayew has confirmed that he does not have any official Facebook account. 
The Ghana international posted on his Twitter page asking his fans following him on Facebook to unfollow those accounts because they are fake. 
I do not have a Facebook account.THANK YOU http://t.co/3OuKLCWmQW — AndrÃ© Ayew (@AyewAndre) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0 
For more sports news visit allSports.com.gh
